Jackett/Jackett

proxy for torrent indexers, connects apps like Sonarr and Radarr

Related repos

  • central hub for managing torrent and usenet indexers across media apps
  • Finds and downloads cross-seed torrents automatically
  • Web interface for managing multiple torrent instances
  • automates TV show downloads and organizes episodes for usenet and bittorrent users
  • web UI for managing and monitoring multiple torrent clients
  • Download manager using Golang and Flutter, handles HTTP, BitTorrent, Magnet, works on all platforms
  • private BitTorrent tracker generator for sharing files with friends
  • C++ library implementing BitTorrent protocol with popular extensions for real-world use
